website_summaries.verdict: This leave-in formula does not interfere with topical flea control products you are using on your cat, and leaves fur soft and fluffy.
pros: Leave-in, no-rinse foam formula with natural ingredients like aloe vera, neem oil, vitamin E, and oatmeal
Safe to use on cats 12 weeks and older
Will not interfere with topical flea control products
Dries quickly so cat spends less time uncomfortable
cons: Leaves fur softer, but may not remove all the dirt or grease on the cat

customer_reviews.title: Neem is EXTREMELY TOXIC to Felines
customer_reviews.text: POISONOUS to CATS. Shame on Dr. Dawn Curie Thomas! Cats are not small dogs! Don't use dog stuff on felines. This neem ingredient can KILL your cat. See UK London Veterinary article magazine image.
customer_reviews.author: 214M

customer_reviews.title: Finally
customer_reviews.text: Okay. My cat, despite getting bathed frequently, still manages to smell like a combination of mouth, belly button lint, and floor. I bathed her with this tonight and she smells like a spring baby. I can't stop huffing her soft head. I didn't think it was possible to love her any more, but I'm a changed man. This stuff rocks.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ham

customer_reviews.title: Effectivr and Gentle Cleanser That My Fussy Persian Tolerates
customer_reviews.text: This product is great at helping me keep my long haired persian's hair smelling and feeling clean without actually having to bathe her multiple times a month. She is a rather messy eater and gets her chest dirty and this waterless foam cleans the mess right up. I have also noticed less shedding since using this product and her hair is so soft and fluffy. The smell is pleasant too. (Picture of Purrsephone and all her glorious floof thanks to the help of this product.)
customer_reviews.author: Crystal M.

customer_reviews.title: Made My Cat's Itching Worse!!!
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the great reviews, I thought I had found something to help Max with his constant itching. Nope. As a matter of fact, it made things worse. Not only was he itching even more, but he got sick from licking it off of himself, which he kept doing for a long time after I applied it. This is going back and I want a refund. I'm going to stick to using coconut oil. That is what gives him relief.
customer_reviews.author: Clairetta Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Senior Cat Clean Now!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in combination with some grooming gloves ( for my senior cat. He no longer bathes himself and was getting pretty stinky with lots of matted hair. I was nervous about this product because he hates baths and strong smells. I can say that he absolutely loved his waterless bath + groom last night! I got so much hair and dirt out of him, and he smells so much better now. All his drool-matted fur came clean, and his coat is soft and smooth again. He seems happier, too! Would definitely recommend this product and will use again!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome but still wet
customer_reviews.text: I have a super neurotic cat. Super neurotic. She impulsively cleans all the time nonstop. One application helped for about two weeks. Now it may say waterless, but your cat will be wet and won't like it. She didn't like it. It's also not foamy. You'll note the cone, I put it on her so the aloe and oils would soak in to her skin and help the itch more than if I let her automatically clean herself. I let her air dry then took the cone off to let her clean. If your cat is itchy, I'd advise the same. Now I just need a bigger bottle!
customer_reviews.author: ShellShock

customer_reviews.title: At 18 he can't easily groom his back anymore and had recently developed intensely ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly, my cat, Yack, actually enjoys this waterless cat bath. After it dries and I brush him down, his fur is clean and very soft. At 18 he can't easily groom his back anymore and had recently developed intensely itchy outbreaks of folliculitis. I chose this product for its safe ingredient list, hoping it would calm his skin and it really has. His itching was immediately better after the first application and has been gone altogether since the second. I'll be using this weekly on him to keep him clean and comfortable. Thank you Vet's Best. We are grateful for your waterless cat bath. Your hairball remedy works great too BTW. Will be looking into your other products next.
customer_reviews.author: L. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Love the product, but received and opened bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I use this along with a wash cloth and a little warm water between baths for my 3 kitties(to spruce up, as we call it, the tips & tails.....ears, paws, and bottom). They love it, and they smell fresh and clean afterward. They get a good brushing afterward, and when their fur dries it is soft and shiny. I would recommend this product. Updated review regarding a recent order...Love this product however, very disappointed to have received an opened bottle that spilled out in the shipping package. Mentioned this in shipping feedback, but the seller has not acknowledged.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: My fat cat smells divine now! And her fur is so soft and silky and smooth!
customer_reviews.text: We love this shampoo! Our cat has a thick double coat of fur, which needs cleaning often because she is a fatty, fatty too fatty cat. But if I try to limit her food... woe is me! She poops on herself and can't get it clean, so we use a warm wash cloth and then use this dry shampoo which leaves her fur so soft and fluffy and beautiful! She is gorgeous afterwards. And it smells lovely. What a wonderful find this was! I 100% recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: OneWayOnlyJesus

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective and smells terrible
customer_reviews.text: Has the unpleasant "antiseptic mixed with animals" smell that most vet clinics have. Also the foam is very watery. My cat tolerates other foam cleansers but not this one. Probably because it goes on watery, rather than foamy. Also, don't follow the instructions to let it air dry and then brush it out. If you let it air dry, the cat's fur will be glued together in sticky spikes, and not brushable without a lot of tugging. Rubbing it out with a towel and then continually brushing and ruffling until dry will keep it from ending up in spikes, but the residue of the product is pretty unpleasant as well.
customer_reviews.author: WS

customer_reviews.title: Smells horrible!!
customer_reviews.text: I chose this after reading ingredients looked safe. Wished I really like this. As my kitty liked the dry shampooing, my first try. I didn't expected she may like. She enjoyed and she wanted more maybe. But it was my first and last try. The only reason was the strong smell. It just smells so strong like MEN'S AFTERSHAVE. So, seems-like-safe formula, my cat likes but smells so horrible. My fault to purchase online without smelling.
customer_reviews.author: Los Angela

customer_reviews.title: Neem oil is NOT toxic!! But bottles came half full!!!
customer_reviews.text: NEEM OIL IS NOT DEEMED TOXIC TO CATS OR DOGS, CONTRARY TO PREVIOUS REVIEW. Just google it lol. Anyways, the idea of this product seems fantastic! A little cleaning in between baths. This is why I was very disappointed when it came half empty today, just like many other reviews state. I reordered to see if it would come half full again and sadly, it did. Definitely will be returning as I paid for 2 oz bottles and they were only half of that..
customer_reviews.author: Waynebeck

customer_reviews.title: Amazing & All-natural!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this stuff! It makes cleaning my disabled cat so much easier! It's all natural ingredients makea it smell good without being overpowering or harsh on my kitty's skin. My Willie-bean doesn't even mind me using on her! Only downside is that it is only available onn Amazon as an add-on item and I go through it too quickly to keep buying it online in addition to at least $25 in Amazon products. But for the time being, it is worth it because my baby girl is clean and happy!
customer_reviews.author: *Trinity*

customer_reviews.title: Two applications of this took away my cat’s dry, flaky skin
customer_reviews.text: Every few months my cat get very dry, flaky skin along his back. And I’m not talking about the tiny tiny little dander that most cats get, I’m talking large chunks of dead skin getting stuck in his fur. This stuff is amazing. He doesn’t really mind it, you can pretty much fool your cat into thinking they’re getting pet. The smell is fairly pleasant, sort of herbal. One application does make a difference, but I’ve found the most success doing a second application a day or two later. After each application I let it completely dry for a few hours and then brush him out.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, gentle and so easy to use! ♥️
customer_reviews.text: My Frankie adopted me after being a stray for sometime. He came to me with many skin conditions and a very lack attitude to keep up his own personal hygiene. After feeding him a healthy diet and much love and attention he looks amazingly better. He even allowed a real bath and purrrrrrred during the process although I still wanted to see how this dry shampoo product would work for him and I actually love it and he doesn’t mind at all. The smell is mild, but so much that it irritates Frankie.
customer_reviews.author: Gizelle Kotschevar

customer_reviews.title: Can't trust the reviews.
customer_reviews.text: Brought it because of all those positive reviews. It came with half full bottle, even the replacement. Smell horrible. My cat threw up on the second time try.
customer_reviews.author: T. P.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I definitely liked this more than my cats. They didnt like how wet they got, for being a dry shampoo, but it smells really good and it made their fur soft. When you brush them out, once it dries, it did wonders for my cat with dense fur. You could brush him all day every day, and there would still be loose fur. This helped it brush out a lot better. I got two brands at the same time, and this one is definitely the keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Jobug

customer_reviews.title: Spray nozzle broken, spills out of side.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is fine, has a nice smell and cleans the cat without leaving residual product on him. The one star rating is because of the broken nozzle. The first time I pressed it down, SO much of the product poured out of the sides from underneath the nozzle. I made sure the lid was screwed all the way on and tried pressing the nozzle again (thinking it was a fluke) and even MORE product poured out from under the cap, and the sides. Now half my product is wasted and I had to transfer the other half into an empty spray bottle I had. This product container is defective and I want a refund or WORKING replacement.
customer_reviews.author: RuXuS

customer_reviews.title: Bottle was only half full!
customer_reviews.text: Just received my first bottle of Vet’s Best Waterless Cat bath. I wanted to open the bottle to see what kind of smell the product has. Imagine my surprise to find that the bottle was half empty! There was no spill in the box. Just a half empty bottle. My thumb is where the product level is. There is no excuse for ripping off your customers and only providing half a product! I expected more from a product that's "Made in the USA."
customer_reviews.author: NC Mom

customer_reviews.title: Easy and effective on my grumpy old man cat
customer_reviews.text: My cat is 15 going on 16 and isn't great at cleaning himself anymore. This worked so well! Because it doesn't feel wet, he didn't get upset or run away. Massaging it in was like petting him, he was literally purring. I followed it up with brushing. Once he was dry he looked a million times better and just like he used to. I'll definitely purchase again when this one runs out.
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: she’ll get curious and would sorta freak out but all in all this is a very good product & my cat smells so great
customer_reviews.text: My cat doesn’t mind me using this on her. She pur everytime we wash her with this. I have to make sure she is really sleepy and tired before I apply this. The only thing I am having trouble is everytime I have to shake it & pump it... she’ll get curious and would sorta freak out but all in all this is a very good product & my cat smells so great.
customer_reviews.author: thepickyshopper

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and effective!
customer_reviews.text: Put this right on the cats as soon as they came into the door. Not a bad smell and the cats smelt clean afterwards. They didn’t fuss too much and I just rubbed it through with a towel after I applied it. I don’t recommend putting it on their face instead just clean their face with water. Someone said Neem oil is toxic to cats but I googled it and it’s only toxic in large quantities, say if they drank it somehow or got a ton of it in their mouth. Otherwise it’s actually not bad. It’s supposed to help them prevent fork licking the shampoo. Thanks for this! I have clean cats now (:
customer_reviews.author: Sarena

customer_reviews.title: Buy this! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: What a great product! My car is a senior and although she tolerates baths they are very stressful for her. This is the answer I’ve been looking for. So easy to use, just message into the fur, let dry and brush. That’s it! Her fur is soft, feels clean (had a very oily, dirty feel and look before, because she is 15 and can’t clean as well as she once did) and finally free of dander! I will always have a bottle of this on hand from now on. PLUS the pump of the bottle broke and Amazon is sending me a replacement at not extra cost! Amazon has the best customer service!
customer_reviews.author: DML 59

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, with an angry kitty
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was pretty good at refreshing my cat's coat in between biannual baths. It smells nice and rather neutral, and foams easily making it easy to apply. At least, it would be easy to apply, if my cats didn't hate it so much. It goes on wetter than I'd hoped, leaving them rather wet and angry. So, effective, but don't think your cats will enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Head & Shoulders for cats.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this on my two cats (one with especially silky/oily fur) for years. They're not thrilled about it, but it's easy to use. Additionally, the fact that for the following 48 hours they smell like a couple boys getting ready for a middle school dance is hilarious. As they are both black, the pleasant scent has the added bonus of making it easy to find them in all the places they're able to squeeze into. In all seriousness though, it refreshes their fur and had helped with one little guy's dandruff.
customer_reviews.author: Wiggin' Out

customer_reviews.title: Very easy
customer_reviews.text: This product was great for my cat. His fur looked really stringy for a while afterwards but when we brushed him out, his fur was soft, thick, and smelled good. The smell wasn't the best in the world but it definitely smells better than he did before. It only took a few minutes to get him clean and it's definitely easier than trying to use water on him.
customer_reviews.author: Amador

customer_reviews.title: I would love to give my honest opinion but...
customer_reviews.text: I was really waiting for this product but I got a beautiful surprise when it arrives.... is very light, I open the container and I get a very pleasant surprise, is empty, zero, nothing. SERIOUS EMPTY BOTTLE!!!, ok I know it's cheap , but come on if it's just a bottle with labels, it's a bit expensive what I pay since I can't store other things in it. And points for the bottle, it's nice, it's really the only thing I can give a review, oh, and points for the bottle if it smells like aloe vera.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Leaking in box
customer_reviews.text: I was wondering why my amazon box was wet when I got it. I opened it and found that the cat shampoo was leaking all over. Luckily nothing was damaged other than the box itself. The reason it was leaking was the lid had not been screwed on tightly. There seemed to be a safety seal on it to try preventing the lid from coming loose, but obviously it didn't work. I would recommend that people order this separate from other items to avoid potential water damage. I am extremely happy that my package didn't include books I had ordered. I do not think I will order this again.
customer_reviews.author: P. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: It’s not easy to get my cat to sit still for even this but it’s better than the alternative. I pump some of this stuff into a brush and brush it through her fur. It gets her pretty wet which she hates but it dries pretty quickly and left her soft, fluffy, and smelling good, so I say this product is a win!
customer_reviews.author: Jtrux

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Odor
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I had no idea how terrible neem oil smelled before I purchased this. The product is unusable as it would prevent anyone from wanting to go near or pet our elder cat due to a smell that I deem worse than the strong urine odor she has developed. I have since done some research and neem oil is considered to have a terrible odor but the benefits for hair are good enough that it is used often. I think it smells similar to that "new car smell" that always upset my stomach.
customer_reviews.author: MsCarbonated

customer_reviews.title: Great for home grooming
customer_reviews.text: Our normal groomer is closed down due to the Corona Virus. I have two tuxedo long medium hairs who get regular brush outs and waterless baths. The other reviews looked good, so I ordered it and followed the advice. I squirted some into my hands, rubbed hands together, and then rubbed the kitties fur while they were distracted eating treats. I waited about 20 minutes to brush them out. It is a light + fresh scent, and I really dig it. Even when things return to normal I don't think we will return to the groomer. This water-less aloe bath costs way less then the groomer!! Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: ProfileName

customer_reviews.title: easy to put on but smells awful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and like the fact it's foam and easy to apply on cat but it does smell awful (like having bug spray on) and not sure how diluted the neem oil is which is questionable if toxic for cats and I can't take the chance as one of my cats has seizures and supposedly it can also work as flea repellent thus makes it more like a chemical even if "naturally derived" from a plant - possibly similar to essential oils - I ended up returning after trying it once
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Two

customer_reviews.title: The foam is easy to apply and their fur looked a lot better ...
customer_reviews.text: Our cats' fur was looking a little oily and dandruff-y, and smelled musty, so we purchased this to try. The foam is easy to apply and their fur looked a lot better after the product dried. Our cats do lick and clean themselves furiously after we apply this, so it's a good thing this is safe for them. It also helps with their mustiness. The cats get a little scared when I shake this bottle because they think it's a spray bottle, so I shake it out of sight first before approaching them.
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: This thing is GREAT for water-phobic felines. One of our cats has allergies and pulls out his hair, so we use this on him and it gives him some relief. Our other cat has dandruff and this also seems to make his life a little better. I highly suggest if you don't want the mess and possible retaliation from cats that hate water.
customer_reviews.author: M.S.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Cloying, old-ladyesque flower smell. But did make kitty's fur soft.
customer_reviews.text: This did make my cat's hair feel softer, but it took a VERY long time to dry (moreso than water) even after brushing, so she kept trying to clean it off herself and I spent hours trying to play with and distract her because I wasn't sure if it would be harmful for her to get in her mouth. It also made her smell like an old lady wearing too much floral perfume. I wish they made this fragrance-free or more natural... the smell was so strong we could smell her just before she walked into a room. Faded a bit after a week, thankfully. In the end, we decided that in the future, we'll just stick with regular baths.
customer_reviews.author: Shrimp! Heaven! Now!

customer_reviews.title: It's the best!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS PRODUCT! Vet said I needed to start bathing my cat. She's older now and doesn't do the best job. No matter how much she grooms herself, she still feels a little greasy and has a lot of dandruff. This foam is so easy to apply. It goes on wet but a good rub followed by her favorite brush and it was easy breasy. Her coat is clean and smells fresh. No more heavy greasy feeling. Seems like the dandruff is not as bad either. Wish I knew about this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Runner

customer_reviews.title: Cat will be clean and soft
customer_reviews.text: Any good cat owner should get this product because even though cats are generally clean and they certainly dont smell like a dog could, they should get bathed or at the very minimum wipe down with this product to get the cat even cleaner. Use it as directed. When you put it on it's pretty sticky but dont worry because when it dries and you brush the cat to remove any shedding, the cat will be clean and soft.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lee

customer_reviews.title: This is a Terrible Product
customer_reviews.text: You have to shake this to use this. The lid isn't properly fitted, so when you shake it, it flings wet droplets everywhere. If you shake it with the lid on to prevent this, the cap fills with liquid instead. I can't get my cat to let me near her to use it because she's skittish. Update: Despite the packaging problems, this smells lovely and worked like a dream. Had a very stinky 16-year old cat with trouble grooming. Now have a lovely-smelling soft and silky 16-year old cat. Improved rating from 2 to 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Aradia

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I have a long haired cat who I shave on their rear-end. Still, they can get a little on there when they poop a wetter poop. Normally, it takes a few wipes (with wet wipes) to where I feel satisfied that they're fresh, again. I spray a little foam on the $5 a box pet wipes (from Amazon) and give one wipe, and she's fresh and clean. Works great. If I'm working and I need to do this, I can be back to what I'm doing right away. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AkrBn

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected!  Must buy for kitties with self grooming issues.
customer_reviews.text: We have an overweight senior cat, who has been lacking in the self grooming dept despite her efforts. This gave her a nice fresh scent and gave her a coat a nice sheen. I do recommend wearing gloves to apply as fur and lint will otherwise stick to your hands ( we did brush her first). Cat actually seemed to enjoy it, since to her it just felt like a thorough petting, and she didn't even seem to be bothered that her fur was damp.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My cat hates being wet but needed a bath so I thought I’d give this a try, and I’m so glad I did! It was very easy to use and while the cat didn’t necessarily enjoy it, he didn’t fight me about it. It was easy to use and apply, and once it dried a bit I brushed him out and now he’s so soft and smells so good! There’s no residue and it worked great. I would highly recommend this product to anyone with a cat that hates water.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Smells horrible
customer_reviews.text: This product is very easy to use and my cat did not mind it. However, I got it because my cat wasn’t smelling so great and this product made him smell 10 times worse. It isn’t a floral or herbal scent. It smells like the building where they keep the farm animals at the fair. I feel bad that I did this to my cat. Pretty sure I should lock my bedroom door tonight in case he decides to get his revenge while I am asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Duchess

customer_reviews.title: Clean cat without being attacked
customer_reviews.text: I saw this on Buzzfeed and figured why not give it a try. Our cat keeps getting mats and have just felt gross for a while. I wasn't about to try and bathe her though and our vets in town don't offer cat baths. This arrived last night so I gave it a try. Our cat seemed to enjoy the "bath". She let me rub it into her fur for a good 10 minutes. I let it dry and then brushed her out. Her fur is super soft now and no longer greasy. I will definitely be buying more! (Our cat is a very fluffy long haired cat. I used about half the bottle on her.)
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Really nice smell but little sticky...
customer_reviews.text: This is a real nice way to freshen up the cat especially after it's made its way out the litter box or been outside. Anyway it seems to be nice and gentle and is helping with the seasonal dander a bit. I love the smell and the cats seem to like it over others we've tried. They all smell nice and look super fluffy after. I find it's best to go light with it though to prevent a sticky residue, the first time I tried it I had to rinse them from putting too much. Otherwise it's paw-sitively meow-valous.
customer_reviews.author: SapphireSky

customer_reviews.title: NO MORE FIGHTS WITH MY CAT!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is cool!! Yes, it's liquidy/foamy but i don't have wet cat and scratch marks all over me from fighting my cat in the bathtub in the past. Now, I just use my fingers to rub the shampoo all over her body while we're on one side of my bed. She still smelled bad after i poured it on her(her last bath was nearly a year ago!), but when it dried after i came home 12 hours later, she smelled sooooo fragrant and clean!! I LOOOOVE this shampoo and so does my cat now, too!!
customer_reviews.author: Purrrfectcat

customer_reviews.title: Great for older cats
customer_reviews.text: Lifesaver. It's a nightmare to dry a cat after a bath and I worry in winter if she will catch a chill and get sick being damp for so long. This is great for quick cleans. It is a wet product so, if your cat is like mine and has huge gobs of litter in between her toes- pick that out before using this. Otherwise, the litter and this make a huge clay mess. Also, my cat hates the sound of the product coming out of the punp so keep a firm grip on your cat. Best used with a cat brush.
customer_reviews.author: K. E. Wise

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead....Buy it !
customer_reviews.text: I have an outside cat. He got sprayed by a skunked VERY BADLY. Knowing how much my cat HATES water I was desperate for something to get rid of the residual skunk smell( I did used another product before using this to remove the immediate skunk oil with GLOVES ON). I used it last night and he was purring as I applied it. So far, he still smells pleasant. He licked him self after and had no reactions to the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Alright product, packaging could use some work.
customer_reviews.text: I think it works pretty well. It is definitely much better than giving your cat an actual bath. That being said, it leaves your cat pretty wet for a while. I also don't think it works all that well for dandruff, but it does leave their coat shiny and fluffy. When my package arrived, about a third of the liquid had leaked out of the bottle. I wasn't too concerned since it was very cheap as an add-on item, but it was kind of annoying that the bottle was soapy and that part of the product I paid for leaked out.
customer_reviews.author: Polyjubjub

customer_reviews.title: Makes a stinky cat fresh
customer_reviews.text: I used this product on my short hair cat 2 weeks ago and she still smells like freshly cleaned carpet. And carpet cleaner was a serious improvement in her scent. The shampoo still makes the cat completely damp for an hour or so. She liked it a lot better than a traditional bath. I took off a star because it was messier than expected. I have not tried it on my long haired cat yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Heroux

customer_reviews.title: The cat's meow
customer_reviews.text: Our cat pretty much takes care of himself with his tongue for cleaning. Though he is an indoor cat too, once in a while he has a cat spit smell right after cleaning. I had not given him a bath for 2 years and thought this might be easier than the bathtub. Indeed it was. He actually enjoyed it. Smells great and makes his fur soft and fluffy. Would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: RMB

customer_reviews.title: Scent is repelling
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the scent of this product, it smells like chemicals, like medicine. I didn't fine-comb it through, since the label did not instruct to do this. But I recommend you do so, otherwise the fur dries in clumps that you'll have to comb out anyway. But, even if it did clean, I wouldn't use it again, because the scent smells too much like chemicals, kind of like the old-time flea products. Ugh
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Ugh 🙄
customer_reviews.text: Well i was really excited to try this because my two cats scream bloody murder when i try to bathe them. I was ready to try something new. I followed the instructions and shook it before using... i got three pumps of foam out before the nozzle got stuck and liquid began coming out the top. I will say my cats didnt mind it. But since it was coming out in a liquidy form that got all over me it had like a sticky residue. I dont plan on reordering this because It was messy and i didnt really care for the scent. Hopefully everyone else has better luck!
customer_reviews.author: Lotuz Flo

customer_reviews.title: Pump broke immediately, made a mess.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. The pump on the bottle broke after three pumps. Comes out everywhere except from the nozzle. Not sure how this is supposed to make bathing a cat easier as I still needed to move the cat into the bathtub so I didn’t get shampoo everywhere which, of course, results in lots of scratches and an upset cat. Might have worked alright if it didn’t break the first time I tried to use it. Dried quick with a gentle toweling off, thankfully, and doesn’t smell awful, just like standard pet shampoo. Maybe my bottle was a lemon, but this was a disappointing first impression.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Truly a miracle product
customer_reviews.text: After the controversy of false reviews recently was hesitant about this product but was grateful for truth in these reviews. After using one time our cats coat was soft and glistened. The easy application was not startling in any way even to our ultra-sensitive feline. He enjoyed the massage while applying. Am certainly recommending this product. Also on Subscribe and Save a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my elderly cat
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for my elderly cat. She has long fur and doesn't always take care of it herself anymore. This product not only smells nice, but it makes her coat smooth, soft, and clean! And it helps motivate her to clean herself. She loves getting her "bath" now and the brushing that follows. Will definitely continue to use in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L.

customer_reviews.title: MY CAT LOVES THIS STUFF!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have never tried a product like this on my various cats (NOR have I ever given them baths) but I was pleasantly surprised!!! My cat was not scared or freaked out at all, he seemed to know instantly that it was good medicine and was actually purring! I thought for sure the smell would bother him, but no. And his "dermititis" problem he was having for weeks cleared up in DAYS! His coat is back to being soft and shiny, and he is happy and relaxed again. Definitely reccommend! (I also use monthly flea medicine but this was something else, he had sores from a fight or something).
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, works wonderfully on dandruff. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this to see it would help our new rescue kitty's dandruff that she was dealing with, and it worked fantastically! It smells wonderful, and we have a house full of people who are very sensitive to strong smells. Not perfume-y, smells light, and clean, and just really good. She's a long-haired cat, and pretty big, so I think I'll only get two applications out of this bottle, but that's well worth it to me. Her coat doesn't feel greasy at all, her skin is moisturized, and her fur is soft. We'll definitely be purchasing this again!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Refresh the cat
customer_reviews.text: My cat is a pain to give baths unless I really had to. He does spend a lot of time grooming and does a good job. Sometimes, I wanted to refresh his fur if it feels a little greasy or maybe a little odor. He doesn't enjoy it either, but it's much easier than bath time. It has a really nice scent and I just lather it onto him. Eventually, it dries and his fur is renewed.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: I'll be ordering more in the near future
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells so good and my cat doesn't run from me when I apply it. The pump makes a little bit of noise when you first press it down but it stops after the third press. The foam is very light and airy and works best when you shake the container well before use. I applied mine to my cats brush and brushed her with it. Avoid your cats eyes. It has the best reviews which is why I purchased it, and I'm not disappointed at all.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: natural way to keep down flea population
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It's easy to apply to my cats' fur and with four of them, it's a great alternative to other shampoo type products. It has a nice, cocoa butter type scent and it seems to relax my cats afterwards. A bonus to this product is that I noticed some dead fleas on them after using it. It also repelled the ones that jumped on them. I'm sure it didn't do this with all of their fleas, but I was impressed that it helped rid my cats of quite a few fleas. A great, natural way to help keep down fleas on your cats and it's natural so it's safe for them to groom afterwards. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: cindy hernandez

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great!
customer_reviews.text: I just wish the bottle was bigger. I have 2 cats. They didn't even suspect that I was giving them a bath which was awesome. I just couldn't get more than their back, sides and head cause they realize that they are wet and run away. LOL. And they are not instantly repelled by the smell which is a huge plus! They smell fresh and clean now and their fur has never been softer!
customer_reviews.author: Real review

customer_reviews.title: Love this product, I use it on my mini schnauzer's beard!
customer_reviews.text: My mini schnauzer is on a raw freeze dried food that is rehydrated with water...needless to say the meat juice and particles get trapped in her beard. If not cleaned/washed she stinks like a dead animal, gross! It's not fun for her (or me) to wash her beard after every meal so I tried this waterless shampoo. I figured if it's safe to use all over a cat and they lick themselves, it would be a much safer option than dog waterless shampoo since her beard dips in her water bowl. We love the scent too! Others I've tried had an overpowering smell this is a nice subtle clean smell.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this again
customer_reviews.text: This waterless shampoo is kinda cool. Cats hate water so really normal cat shampoos are great but are so hard to use. This stuff is super easy cause its got the pump.. But the smell is a little stinky. Besides that I would yes to wanting this and yes I'd buy it again. It really helped with my cat who is insane!! And scares me. Then it helped so much with the cat I lost a few weeks ago
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Works great but scent is a little strong, use gloves
customer_reviews.text: I really like the results of this waterless bath for my 3 cats. They had some dandruff and after one use it was gone. The only thing I didn’t like is the scent is a little strong and stays on your skin even after washing your hands multiple times. But I have a sensitive nose so that might not bother you. If you think it would just use gloves when you apply it to your cat.
customer_reviews.author: Susuwatari

customer_reviews.title: Safe!
customer_reviews.text: My kitty is absolutely terrified of water but she’s a liiiiiittle chunky and can’t quite clean ALL of herself 100% so this was a nice alternative! Didn’t stress her out, she smells great, feels soft, dried quick, and the ingredients are trustworthy. She didn’t get sick or act any different or anything, perfectly safe. I recommend. :)
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for geriatric kittehs with arthritis who have a hard time cleaning themselves. My cat has always been good at taking baths but with his age and condition, needed an alternative to give an actual bath. This product works great! He and I are happy with how clean he is and he didn't have to get drenched with the shower nozzle
customer_reviews.author: BettyJ

customer_reviews.title: extremely disappointed, i should have listened to the other reviewers ...
customer_reviews.text: extremely disappointed, i should have listened to the other reviewers when they said that they received this product only have filled. when i received this no rinse dry shampoo it looked as if half was gone.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Makela

customer_reviews.title: Your cat will smell awesome.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. My cat for scared and hid in her litter box after a move so she smelled AWFUL. I used this on her and she didn't even really noticed what was happening till I was done, she thought I was just petting her. It is wet and not really foamy but that's good because the cat doesn't seem to notice it as it goes on and I've used it many times now. Your cat will smell noticeably better and have a nice clean scent. Like you will seriously want to cuddle it just to smell it. Great stuff and the only way I can clean my cat.
customer_reviews.author: TraccieLutz

customer_reviews.title: My cat smells like a baby’s butt... in a good way
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t quite solve my fat cat’s skin/fur issues (dryness, flakiness), but it certainly seemed to help. I brushed her into blissful oblivion and was able to rub this allllll into her fur while she purred in perfect zen. She smells like a (clean) baby wipe for at least a week after. And there’s ton of product left after two weekly applications.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Black

customer_reviews.title: watery
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it was the packaging or the formula, but this did not foam at all. When I pumped the pump, it sputtered and sort of leaked out all around the dispenser, with just a slight foaminess. It was rather watery, but I managed to rub what I caught onto my cat's fur and it seemed to clean and condition it fairly well. I liked the scent, but I just couldn't get it to come out as a foam and it was really messy, dripping all over the floor. I won't order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonette in Denver

customer_reviews.title: Great for dander
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works very well! My cats dander has improved tremendously! The directions say to put the shampoo on and wait.. We don't usually wait lol she licks it off otherwise. So we put the shampoo on and brush her right away. And she smells soo fresh! The clean scent lasts for at least 7 days. Her dander was really bad and I honestly haven't noticed it since starting this shampoo! I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: BrynnDTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Product good.. applicator not so much
customer_reviews.text: The product seems to work well for the short time it actually foamed. I was able to get maybe half of my one cat done before the liquid started shooting out from the base of the noozle and now it won't foam at all. The smell of the product is really good and it applied nice when it was working properly.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Hill

customer_reviews.title: Beware your cat will stink at first
customer_reviews.text: My cat stunk bad at first after using this product and I was so worried because she kept trying to lick it off. She smelled like really strong nair for a couple days and it was almost unbearable but after the smell went away she felt very soft and clean. Not too sure if the smell made it worth it, that's how bad it was
customer_reviews.author: Rena-Rochelle Salvador

customer_reviews.title: Good product overall
customer_reviews.text: Good product overall, especially over putting my cat in a bath/washing, which she has NO tolerance for. This product however does not foam well if that's what your looking for, know that this comes out more like bubbled liquid, so your cat will get a wet feeling/sensation. The fragrance is pleasant and does not overwhelm, my cat tolerated well and certainly smelled much better---would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike R.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking care of my son's Persian for almost 2 months. Her hair mats so easily. I bought this Waterless Shampoo in hopes that it would make combing out the mats easier. It actually did. She's very easy going so it wasn't much trouble to apply this. Her coat was whiter and brushing was effortless. Recommend this highly. I'll have to get another bottle for my son when he takes her home.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl H

customer_reviews.title: Cat Approved
customer_reviews.text: Wowowow my cat is super soft. He loved the massage. Scent is mild and sweet. What a great product for the price, will last me a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great shampoo
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use. My cat appreciates 'water-free' she just meowed a few times otherwise she was totally comfortable. Other buyers mention the smell, but I didn't notice any unpleasant smells. I'll probably use this on her once a month so not sure how long it will last. Note: SHAKE THE BOTTLE VIGOROUSLY or else you will not get much foam.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm for dandruff
customer_reviews.text: I started noticing quite a bit of dandruff on my black cat, so I decided to try this "dry" shampoo. It's a foam that you apply, let dry, and then brush the coat. At first he was confused about what I was doing to him, but he quickly came around after a treat or two. The foam has a mild, pleasant smell. It dried quite quickly and soon my little guy was rolling around enjoying his pampering. His dandruff is gone, he smells amazing, and his coat is super shiny and soft. Who needs a bubble bath?
customer_reviews.author: hi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome!!! I'm so happy. I have a rescue cat. She has developed arthritis due to an injury and cannot groom her back very well. This product did a great job. She didn't mind it either. She actually was quite affectionate after the whole process. So happy!!! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Product
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed! My kitty got her paw stuck in a glue spider trap, so I had to use olive oil to get the sticky out of her fur. I have her two baths and the oil was still in her fur. I bought this to give her a break from bathing and after two days her fur is almost completely oil free. I love the smell and more importantly she likes the smell of it too. I love that this has natural ingredients. I’m very happy with this product. The only thing I would want to change is the amount that comes in a bottle, I would pay for a bigger bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah L.

customer_reviews.title: Dandruff be gone!
customer_reviews.text: I have an older cat who has great difficulty with thoroughly grooming her backside. Because of this she has been getting really bad dandruff, which makes her very uncomfortable and itchy. I can't give her a regular bath without running the risk of having my eyes ripped out in a rage, so I was excited to find this product. We've been using it to help her meet her grooming needs, and all dandruff and other signs of skin irritation are completely cleared up. This stuff is a win-win for everyone! I get to keep my eyes, and she gets the relief she needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clean kitty approved
customer_reviews.text: I'm always surprised at how easy it is to use this on my cat. She can be a bit difficult to manage if she doesn't want to do something, but after the initial surprise reaction to getting held while the drippy foam is put on her, she surrenders pretty easily... which never happens with medications or trips to the vet. So, it must be a really be a relaxing smell for her. I'm taking away a star because of the controversy about need oil. I wish there was some dependable research, or some agency over these products so we could know that it was okay to put on our beloved furry family members.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger cat

customer_reviews.title: Try this you like it!
customer_reviews.text: I have a senior Maine Coon who no longer Grooms himself as well due to arthritis and this foaming no rinse shampoo has been a godsend I put it on rub it in and when it's dry I brush him out and he looks much better and I believe he feels better. It removes oil and dander. This along with Burt's Bees cat dander towels and he's looking quite handsome.
customer_reviews.author: Nini

customer_reviews.title: My small tiger loves this stuff.....
customer_reviews.text: My 32 pound Norwegian Forest Cat loves this stuff. I brush him at the same time that I am applying it to his coat. Makes his fur very soft and has a pleasant smell. In my opinion about some of con reviews on here, I think people just like to complain about anything. My cat digs this stuff. I recommend to anyone who has a cat that doesn't like water.
customer_reviews.author: Houston TX

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturing Defect
customer_reviews.text: It used to work great, but now the last three bottles have had manufacturing defects where the foam only comes out a couple of times before the thing jams. I don't know what's going on, but it appears that a major batch, if not all of them now, are defective.
customer_reviews.author: LBrown

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cat product
customer_reviews.text: Found out about this product from Buzzfeed and decided to try it on my short-hair cat. As described, product is easy to use and her fur smells great and is SO soft. Wish I knew about this product earlier. Need to test it out on my long-haired cat next and wonder if it could possibly work on my large water-phobic dog??
customer_reviews.author: SYK

customer_reviews.title: He does not enjoy having this put on him as it leaves him ...
customer_reviews.text: My guy hates baths with a passion. He has issues with dandruff and dry skin so he needed something to help him out. He does not enjoy having this put on him as it leaves him wet but it's a far easier process then bathing him. It leaves his coat shiny and takes care of his skin issues. I noticed that the white parts of him would get kind of yellowy and this removes that. He has never smelled bad to me but this product leaves a pleasant scent on him that is not overly perfumy. I have not tired other brands but at $5 for and the fact it helps him I have not needed to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for something like this to use on my cat who has dry sensitive skin and obviously since he’s a cat he hates getting a bath. This is the perfect solution - a waterless shampoo! It has a decent clean smell to it and he did not seem to mind it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna McDonald

customer_reviews.title: NO CHEMICAL SMELL! very subtle fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know what to expect or what it would smell like. It is safe to use with flea treatments. The smell is very subtle it's not like perfume or anything like that its just a slight smell enough for your kitty to smell better and their fur to look conditioned without the worry about chemicals on your furbaby. I will definately be purchasing again in future. If you're on the fence about it might as well try it out especially if you have a smelly cat problem.
customer_reviews.author: Bedtime79

customer_reviews.title: Not flea/tick cleaner but still wonderful to have around.
customer_reviews.text: Just note: this isn’t the flea stuff. I made the mistake of ordering this one before checking if it was the flea wash. It wasn’t. Sad face. But it is still a nice one to have to spruce up the kitten on her naughty days. She played in the toilet-don’t forget to close your seat-and then went into the litter box—Oy! But having this, by accident, no less!; made cleanup easy-peasy. Smells great too!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Jean

customer_reviews.title: May hurt your cat!!! ASK YOUR VETERINARIAN BEFORE USING!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product have my car extreme itching, and caused her to rip her for out in patches!!! She was in misery, I followed the directions but Vet said Neem Oil is toxic and some cats have extreme reactions to it. None of which I saw on the page or the product prior to use. My poor baby suffered needlessly! Shame putting defenseless animals in pain for no good reason other than money! 🤬
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Hatmaker

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT RECOMMEND -makes them sick!!
customer_reviews.text: My cat got sick afterwards. She didnt eat for almost two days and was distancing herself from the family. We've never seen that behavior before. I actually gave her a real bath to wash off the toxic smelling chemicals. She was pissed, but her behavior was back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: ForeverMoore

customer_reviews.title: Soothed itchy chin from oral carcinoma on kitty
customer_reviews.text: This product was wonderful, it smelled fresh and clean. We had a kitty with oral bone cancer so she started drooling a lot and there was a LOT of itching under her chin during tumor growth. This formula soothed her itching significantly when applied directly to that area and it kept the smell manageable. We ordered several bottles as the kitty cat lived for about five months with the condition and it was very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: OldTex

customer_reviews.title: BEST DRY SHAMPOO EVER
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing the smell is GREAT but not at all overpowering so it does not even bother my cat with allergies. This is the only dry shampoo I will ever get for my cats it actually WORKS does not leave any sticky residue just soft smell good fur!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dries pretty fast if you wanted to give your cat a quick scrub down.
customer_reviews.text: My eczema acted up on my hand when i used to touch her (my cat's an outdoor cat), so i feel like her hair used to be a lot rougher. After using the foam shampoo. SUPER. HELLA. SOFT. Bro like, i cannot tell you how helpful it is not having to douse her with water (which stereotypes lead true, cats dont like water), then soap her up and to rinse her fur to make her look like a water monger. Story short; her fur doesnt bother my allergies nor my eczema.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great product for cleaning a kitty
customer_reviews.text: This smell is very pleasant and not overwhelming or “fake”. It doesn’t smell like perfume or a field of daisies - just fresh! I love it. Easy to put on kitty i place on my hands and i pet him as usual it’s waterless but it is a wet product so kitty’s fur will be damp after use. Which is the reason for my 4 stars. Honestly no biggie for me but just for the sake of the review.
customer_reviews.author: G 4:44

customer_reviews.title: No more fighting during bath time.
customer_reviews.text: I tried bathing my 8 year old cat in the tub and left with a dirty cat and many puncture holes in my body that weren't there before. He had something on his fur and it needed to be cleaned! I got this bath foam and applied it to his affected areas and then brushed him really well. His grossness was washed away and his fur feels so much better. He went crazy for the brush scratchies so it was painless this time! I didn't care for the smell of it, but I didn't smell it on him after I was done, just on my hands and that was washed away with soap and water.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Leaks during shipping
customer_reviews.text: I want to give this 5 stars but I can't. The product itself is great but the company really needs to seal their lids. I've ordered this twice and both times I open the box to find that it's leaked everywhere inside it's bag. BOTH times.
customer_reviews.author: Darcus Murray

customer_reviews.title: Awesome invention
customer_reviews.text: My cat has a very course, thick and oily coat. She gets lots of mattes too. She loves to be held and brushed and petted so I decided this foam shampoo might do the trick. Once she was hugging me, I pumped a few balls of foam on her and massaged it in. It worked great eliminating her oil and dander and even lasted a couple of weeks. I wish something magical could happen to those mattes though. Had to cut them out (not what that product was for anyway).
customer_reviews.author: Maria S.

customer_reviews.title: I love it! It smells so good
customer_reviews.text: (PROS): I love it! It smells so good, and lasts on your cat for a long time. Like it's been a month and I can still smell this shampoo on her. I highly suggest buying it. It'll be worth your money, especially if your cat doesn't like water. I highly suggest it. (CONS): There's only one con I can think of so far. When you open it it's hard to get the lid back on so it will probably spill. Put it on a flat surface where it can't spill.
customer_reviews.author: Kari L. Raybon  ;3

product_meta.title: Vet's Best Waterless Cat Bath | No Rinse Waterless Dry Shampoo for Cats | Natural Formula | 4 Ounces
product_meta.description:
Groom your cat when they can’t (or won’t) do it themselves. Easy to use, Vet's Best Waterless Cat Bath soothes dry skin and leaves your cat clean and soft. 
The no-rinse foam shampoo and calming fragrance ensures a no fuss, relaxing spa day for your feline companion.
feature_bullets: A PRACTICAL SOLUTION - Easy to use, Vet’s Best Waterless Cat Shampoo soothes and moisturizes dry skin and leaves your cat clean and soft.

NATURAL INGREDIENTS - Our unique leave-in formula uses key natural ingredients, such as aloe vera, neem oil, vitamin E, and oatmeal to gently clean, condition, and moisturize your cat’s skin and coat.

BATHTIME FOR CATS WHO HATE BATHS - Quick and easy solution to groom your cat when they can’t (or won’t) do it themselves. No need to rinse the shampoo from the fur, which makes water averse cats happy.
SAFE AND EFFECTIVE - Safe to use with cats 12 weeks or older, and will not affect topical flea control products.
VET’S FORMULA - Veterinarian formulated and recommended, the no-rinse foam shampoo and calming fragrance ensures a no fuss, relaxing spa day for your feline companion.
